structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
The Governor, Lieutenant Governor And Council, Certain Officers Under The Governor And Council, And State Library

law.text: The governor shall annually issue a proclamation setting apart March fourteenth as Slovak Independence Day, in commemoration of the promulgation of the March fourteenth, nineteen hundred and thirty-nine Declaration of Slovak National Independence which established the Slovak Republic as a sovereign nation-state and recommending that said day be observed in an appropriate manner by the people.
